game.Cards
Class Card

java.lang.Object
  game.Cards.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
Distance, EmptyCard, Hazard, Remedy, Safety
public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class represents a Card by encapsulating its attributes such as its credits .

Author:
Author
